page.title: 08Sport and Leisure
page.content: { Melville Castle Hotel{ Melville castle hotel has been in business since {1947.}Melville castle hotel is not a family business. Between {8}&{12}people work there. The working hours are{6am}or{6pm}shift work. The castle itself is{207}years old,and they own{178}acres. Darren Quinn { BroomieKnowe golf club Broomieknowe golf club was formed in{ {19O6},At first they only rented it but after world war{2}they bought most of it. The golf culb rent the other little part of land from the executars of the late Raymond Hudson. Before,the land that the golf course now stands on what used to be agricultural.There are 740 members which consists full,associate, Junior or house member.The club own's 85 acres,and is a 18 hole golf course.
